name: The European Federation for Cosmetic Ingredients AISBL
legal: EFfCI is registered in Belgium as AISBL, No  0840.955.059
goal:
EFfCI, established in 2000, represent the manufacturers of chemicals and natural ingredients for the cosmetics industry and advocate the collective interests.
EFfCI is representing ~ 100 companies, all major suppliers and a great number of small and medium sized enterprises.
interests: Business and Industry, Consumers, Environment, Public Health
euInitiatives: Cosmetic Regulation, ECHA Call for Evidence and Information on the intential uses of Microplastic particles in products of any Kind, EU Working Group on Cosmetics, European Union Observatory for Nanomaterials (EUON), SCCS
